GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.15 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
um: Fix out-of-bounds read in LDT setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 9caad70819aef3431abaf73ba5163b55b161aba0, it was introduced in version v2.6.15 by commit 858259cf7d1c443c836a2022b78cb281f0a9b95e. For more details please see the references link.
